dict.string:
Step 1. Find an image that suits your device and save it
Step 2. Locate and move the image in Filza to /Library/PreferenceBundles/MiniChargeOS.bundle
Step 3. Delete the original BG(Jake) and rename your image to 'Background.png'
Step 4. Respring to see your new image.
Information: - Original Apple wallpapers are located in /Library/Wallpaper - Camera Roll images are located in /var/mobile/Media/DCIM/
